#labels Featured
= pswrdgen =
Semantic Password generator that uses WordNet 2.1, random capitalization, and character swapping.  Python console based.  Future support is also planned for Microsoft's .NET IronPython.


== Installation ==
  # You must have [http://python.org Python] installed. (v0.1.0 has been tested on 2.4 and 2.5 in Windows)
  # You must have [http://wordnet.princeton.edu/obtain WordNet 2.1] installed before use.
  # Download the pswrdgen.py module and run __main__
